name: colanode
description: Cola Node is a self-hosted tool for organizing all your media libraries such as movies, music, and books in a single place. It supports metadata fetching, recommendations, and provides a friendly web UI.
features: Unified Library: Organize movies, music, and books in one place. Single source for all media.
Metadata Fetching: Automatic retrieval of covers, descriptions, and details. Beautiful library presentation.
Smart Recommendations: Discover new content based on your preferences. Never run out of ideas.
Friendly Web UI: Intuitive interface for browsing and managing collections. Easy for everyone.
Self-Hosted: Keep your media library private and under your control. No third-party tracking.
Multi-Format Support: Handle various file types and media formats. Works with your existing collection.
